NAME: Antony Jacob
ABOUT:
Antony - a profitable growth and scale up specialist has a track record of building credible companies in General & Health Insurance.  He can envisage, create and implement the most ambitious goals: AMHI from a top line of 10 to 350 million USD with an extraordinary team of 4500 from 100 and a network of over 180 branches. A strategist, he has a distinct ability to consistently improve efficiencies on customer deliverables through product innovation & continuous process/operational improvements. His expertise lies in stakeholder management (including an Indian partner search and JV), reputable distribution tie-ups, marketing & rebranding (from Apollo DKV) and uses both finance and business acumen on valuations, risk and compliance. Demonstrated ability to lead people and teams both local and expatriates by example. 

Antony has won the “CEO award” two years in a row and under his leadership, many notable awards are: 
2010-2018 - "Great Place to Work" recognition 9 years in a row.
2018 - Health Insurance provider of the year by Outlook Money, Health Insurance Company of the year by ABP News...
2017 - General Insurance Company Asia wide, Best Health Insurance Company of the year by Times Network/Insurance India Summit...
2016 - Health Insurance Company of the year, Best BFSI Brand Award by the Economic Times (excellence in Health Insurance)

Antony has built a road map for insurance in India (won India’s first private General Insurance license) and is a trusted spokesperson in disseminating General and Health Insurance information to the public over two decades of being in a leadership position. He is an active member on various committees of FICCI, CII, Indo German and was on the Sub Committee of RBI’s Pension & Insurance. He is a member of the Young Presidents Organization and on the Regional Board South Asia.
